channel.title: Markdown on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Markdown
item.description:
Scratch this. something something else H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alt-H2 Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this. * unordered list * laksjdfalss ordered list ordered list laskdfjalk I’m an inline-style link I’m an inline-style link with title
Inline-style image: Inline code has back-ticks around it.
